subject: fix FTBFS use flags not defines
commitMessage:
fix FTBFS use flags not defines

Else it will produce invalid symbol '-D-pthread'

Without it, it'll break on some configuration, ie :

  cd /home/abuild/rpmbuild/BUILD/wrt-plugins-common-0.3.115/src/plugins-api-support \
    && /usr/bin/c++ \
      -D-pthread \
      -DDPL_LOGS_ENABLED -DEXPORT_API="" ...

Please refer to documention for more details :
http://www.cmake.org/cmake/help/v2.8.11/cmake.html#command:add_definitions

Change-Id: Ife54ebee8b5fd5008e72b866fa325e961a484d1a
Bug-Tizen: PTREL-735/part
Signed-off-by: Philippe Coval <philippe.coval@open.eurogiciel.org>

reviewer.name: Baptiste (DO NOT USE) DURAND (DO NOT USE)
